Date - {3}
Time - {4}
Area - {5}
Price Pitch - {6}
Service Fees - {7}
Total Price - {8}
Price per Player - {9}

Keep in mind you will still be charged if you cancel less than 24 hours prior the session starts. For more information, please visit our cancellation policy section in FAQ.
For any enquiries, don't hesitate to contact Charlotte, our Customer care agent. charlotte@sidekickfit.co
Have a great game !
